VISUAL: There's a red arrow pointing down towards two gravestones labeled "RIP". The ground is pixelated with grass blocks on top and dirt underneath. Rocks are scattered at the top edge. There's also an image of Pharaoh Tutankhamun next to some measurements like "1.8m, 6ft" and "4m, 13 ft".

AUDIO: A man speaks about zombies coming from a certain depth, mentioning "4 meters down" and arriving at a specific depth related to Tutankhamun. It seems like he's explaining something about the depth of zombies compared to Tutankhamun's tomb depth.If you have any other thoughts or questions about this video, feel free to share!

VISUAL: There's an illustration showing a Minecraft - like scene with grass blocks, dirt blocks, and some rocks on top. A red arrow points down to a white block representing Pharaoh Tutankhamun's tomb. There are measurements next to it, like "1.8m, 4m, 6m" which seem to indicate depth levels. The background is blue.AUDIO: Someone is speaking about Pharaoh Tutankhamun's tomb being discovered at a certain depth below the surface. It mentions reaching a maximum depth of six meters.If you have any other thoughts or questions about this, feel free to share!

VISUAL: There's an illustration showing different depths underground with measurements like "1.8m, 4m, 6m" and "12m". There's also a red arrow pointing down and a black pickaxe icon. A tombstone labeled "RIP" is shown at one depth. An image of a crocodile appears next to "Crocodile Burrows" text. The background has grass blocks and dirt blocks.AUDIO: Someone is speaking about how deep metal detectors can detect signals from, mentioning that at 12 meters we can find the deepest burrows dug by something. It seems to be explaining something related to archaeology or excavation.If you have any other thoughts or questions about this, feel free to share!
